$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

span.p: The April 20, 2020 Board meeting has been moved to April 27, 2020 which will include the Final Budget Hearing and be held remotely.
A link for the meeting will be displayed here by Friday April 24, 2020.

a.title: Go to comments for April Board meeting

div.span: The Tinton Falls School District will continue our Home Instruction/Remote Learning Plan until at least May 15, 2020 by order of Governor Murphy.

li.a: Remote Instructional Learning Plan can be found here
Tinton Falls Closure Plan for DOE submission - 4.2.20

li.strong: Meals for Breakfast and Lunch will be available for pick-up on Monday and Wednesday's at Tinton Falls Middle School from 10am-11:30am through April 3rd.

a.title: Go to comments for School Closing - Remote Learning

strong.span: The Board of Education office is open with very limited staff Monday-Friday from 9-1. Please call 732-460-2404 with questions or concerns or email the teachers/school staff. The schools are not open. Please call this number with any questions.
Technology concerns: Please email Dennis Duarte, Network Administrator at dduarte@tfschools.org

a.title: Go to comments for Board Office Hours

span.p: The Monmouth County Division of Behavioral Health is here to help with any mental health issues or crisis. Please click here for a list of numbers and services.

p.span: Click the link below to see our official District Calendar for the 2020-2021 school year.
The District Calendar is a document that contains a list of all the important dates you'll want to know, such as school holdays, single session days, and semester ending dates and report card dates.

a.title: Go to comments for District Calendar for 2020-2021

p.span: Click the link below for access to all of the back-to-school documents parents must review by Friday, September 13, 2019.

a.title: Go to comments for Parent Information Packet

p.span: Click the link below for directions accessing the parent portal

a.title: Go to comments for Parent Portal Login Directions

p.span: Click the links below to see our two official District Calendars.
The District Calendar is a document that contains a list of all the important dates you'll want to know, such as school holdays, single session days, and semester ending dates and report card dates.
The District Activity Calendar is a constantly updated school calendar that will show you events happening at each school, such as concerts and other special activities.

span.a: District Activity Calendar for 2019-2020 School Year

a.title: Go to comments for District Calendar for 2019-2020 School Year

span.strong: Free and Reduced Lunch Application Process -

p.span: Children need healthy meals to learn. Tinton Falls Public Schools participates in Child Nutrition Programs which offers lunch to all Tinton Falls students as well as breakfast. The District also offers free and reduced meal prices for those families who qualify, which is determined by completing a free and reduced meal application.

a.title: Go to comments for Free and Reduced Lunch Application Process

span.strong: Interested in Early Birds or Time Plus? -

p.span: If you are interested in our Early Birds or Time + child care programs, please check out the links below. These packets have all the information on these programs, including registration forms.

a.title: Go to comments for Early Birds & Time + Information Packet 2019-2020

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.alt: Congratulations! MFA, SRS & TFMS are named NJ Schools of Character

a.span: Congratulations! MFA, SRS & TFMS are named NJ Schools of Character

div.p: MFA & TFMS received full designation and SRS received Honorable Mention. TFMS now a National School of Character!! A credit to all staff, students and the community!

a.title: Go to comments for Congratulations! MFA, SRS & TFMS are named NJ Schools of Character
Go to comments for REFERENDUM PROJECT

div.p: Click on the title upon to view the presentation.

a.title: Go to comments for Standards Based Report Card Presentation

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.span: Tinton Falls School District Mission Statement

em.span: In a partnership with the community, the Tinton Falls School District
will create effective programs which enable all students
to achieve academic excellence, based on the
NJ Student Learning Standards in order to become socially
responsible, productive citizens and life-long learners.

li.a: 2020-2021 Integrated Preschool Registration Form and Information Packet

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
